attributes.action: Ask the Football Association of England to introduces laws where a player is booked and then sent off for foul language.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It says it all. Foul and abusive language should be punished as dissent and enforced. No wonder children think it is ok to use such language if we see the likes of Wayne Rooney saying 'F*** off Ref, your a P**** on sunday afternoon TV.
